{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3521590,"name":"","username":"ElectricTurtle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/electricturtle/{size}/260014_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-09T20:53:59.415Z","cooked":"

We just recived our Halio-8 chip, but when we plugged in in the limelight displayed a ‚ÄúCheck Accelerator‚Äù text on the output, the chip is definitly plugged in, but I can send pictures, any other teams have this problem? Thanks!

I have 2 LL4 with the Halio-8 chips and have the same issue with both. I submitted a support ticket. I tried with the USB-C connection only, could be a power issue?

I‚Äôll post their reply unless they update this thread first.

image1120√ó243 32.9 KB

image1724√ó723 158 KB

Dave Polito
TC Titans #3767
